授業目的:
"Environmental Biotechnology" is the correct or real title of the lecture with the purpose of:
1. Obtaining some comprehensive knowledge of fundamental & recent knowledge of Environmental and Biotechnology
2. Students will be familiars with the problem and problem solver of Environmental Biotechnology
到達目標: This Environmental Biotechnology could contribute and support their future research or carrier. Furthermore becoming familiar and more proficient at reading and critiquing references or literature
授業方法: The theories, flowchart, pathway, and video-related Environmental Biotechnology will be taught via slides of PowerPoints. Some of the questions will be given to students in order to evaluate their understanding of this lecture.

第1回: Definition - concept & scope of environmental biotechnology
第2回: Applications of biotechnology in environmental monitoring.
第3回: Microbial characteristics - Principles - Use of GEMS in environmental remediation - merits and demerits
第4回: Bio tools - Biosensors in environmental protection and monitoring - 1
第5回: Bio tools - Biosensors in environmental protection and monitoring - 2
第6回: Wastewater treatment - Role of Microbial systems - Immobilization technology in wastewater treatment.
第7回: Bioreactors - types, designs, and functional characteristics - Microbial metabolism
第8回: Bioremediation - principles - biodegradation of pesticides - pathways.
第10回: Bioindicators – Biomarkers – Biosensors – Biomonitoring  –  Polluted  environment  –  Short and long term monitoring of remediated sites
第11回: Biotechnology of Microbial composting  -  Biofertilizers- Biopesticides
第12回: Bioprocesses in waste treatment - Production of value-added products from waste
第13回: Enzyme production from wastes – Biodegradable plastics  - Environmental  implications - 1
第14回: Enzyme production from wastes – Biodegradable plastics  - Environmental  implications - 2
トピック.授業外学習2: Master students have to prepare by themselves concerning the knowledge of Environmental Biotechnology based on the textbook or international journal that we offer as references. During the class, there will be a temporary discussion in order to evaluate whether the students understand or not.

参考書/Reference books2: Prentice Hall of India PvT. Ltd. New Delhi
参考書/Reference books3: Affil. East West press Pvt. Ltd. New Delhi
